summary: Frontend testing completed for Admin Panel P0 features. All admin pages load correctly and use centralized API client. Fixed critical bug in AdminAuditLogs.js where log.details (an object) was being rendered directly as React child causing runtime error.

issues: Chart shows warning about width/height being -1, but chart still renders correctly

critical_code_review_comments: AdminAuditLogs.js line 167: Fixed bug where log.details (object) was rendered directly as React child. Changed to check typeof before rendering.
seed_data_creation: None - used existing admin and testclient credentials
context_for_next_testing_agent: All P0 Admin Panel features verified working: (1) Admin login with admin/admin123 credentials works correctly. (2) Dashboard loads with Today's Money Flow, Platform Performance Trend, Risk & Exposure sections. (3) Clients page lists users with search and status filter. (4) Orders page shows orders with tabs for All/Deposits/Withdrawals/Pending/Voided. (5) Approvals page shows pending deposits and withdrawals with approve/reject functionality. (6) Reports page has Balance Flow, By Game, Voids, Risk & Exposure, Advanced tabs. (7) Audit Logs page displays admin actions with pagination and action filter. (8) Client Detail page shows client info, financial summary, credentials, transactions, and overrides. All pages use centralized admin API client from /app/frontend/src/api/admin.js.
features_tested: Admin login with admin/admin123 credentials
Admin Dashboard loads with data-testid='admin-dashboard'
Dashboard displays Today's Money Flow (Deposits In, Withdrawals Out, Net Profit)
Dashboard displays Platform Performance Trend chart
Dashboard displays Risk & Exposure section
Dashboard displays Referral Program Growth Tracking
Admin Clients page loads with data-testid='admin-clients-page'
Clients page lists users from /api/v1/admin/clients endpoint
Clients page has search and status filter functionality
Admin Orders page loads with data-testid='orders-page'
Orders page has tabs: All, Deposits, Withdrawals, Pending, Voided
Admin Approvals page loads with data-testid='approvals-page'
Approvals page shows pending deposits and withdrawals tabs
Admin Reports page loads with data-testid='reports-page'
Reports page has tabs: Balance Flow, By Game, Voids, Risk & Exposure, Advanced
Admin Audit Logs page loads correctly (fixed bug)
Audit Logs page displays logs with action filter and pagination
Client Detail page loads when clicking view button on clients list
Client Detail page shows Overview and Analytics tabs
All admin pages use centralized admin API client

bugs_fixed.issue: React runtime error: Objects are not valid as a React child (found: object with keys {referred_by})
bugs_fixed.fix: Changed log.details rendering to check typeof before rendering - only render if string, otherwise use fallback description
